snippet: An overhaul for Spin.com includes plans for a streaming music player, nine new blogs and Web-only content like news and album reviews.
abstract: An overhaul for Spin.com includes plans for a streaming music player, nine new blogs and Web-only content like news and album reviews.
lead_paragraph: With the popularity of music streaming services like Spotify and Pandora, music magazines have had to find compelling ways to keep their readers engaged.
